title: Cadet Rousselle
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, James Beveridge and George Dunning
brief_description: Animated puppets illustrate the old French satirical song about Cadet Rousselle, ostentatious, affected, the clown of the period between the French Revolution and the military order of Napoleon. Cadet Rousselle falls down a ladder, trips on battlements, even his dogs will not obey him. Animation: George Dunning, Colin Low Award: Gardone
